plot: The mysterious blue light returns but John is no longer dreaming. Now in the real world, John must seek help from William, a Taoist who has a lot of information on the supernatural entity. ...
title: Inescapable Curse
plot_es: The mysterious blue light returns but John is no longer dreaming. Now in the real world, John must seek help from William, a Taoist who has a lot of information on the supernatural entity. ...
plot_en: The mysterious blue light returns but John is no longer dreaming. Now in the real world, John must seek help from William, a Taoist who has a lot of information on the supernatural entity. ...
